snippet.title: Lawns, Fences, and Fertilizer - Using Perimeter and Area With Unknown Variables
snippet.description: http://tapintoteenminds.com Most students seem able to work with perimeter and area formulas when dealing with known values, however, introducing algebra by tossing in a variable can cause major hurdles.  This video is intended for students to be able to better visualize multiplying variable terms (monomial by monomial and monomial by binomial), collecting like terms, and simplifying algebraic expressions involving measurement.
